Data Fields
TestFmk_MCB_t Struct Reference
Test Framework API » Test Framework Internal Data Structures

Test Framework Master control block. More...

#include <test/common/framework_internal.h>

Data Fields

TestFmk_InitCfg initCfg
 This is the configuration which was used to initialize the module.
 
TestFmk_ProfileCfg profileCfg
 Loaded Profile configuration.
 
TestFmk_ProfileHandle profileHandle
 Profile Handle: This is the profile which has been loaded and initialized.
 
ADCBuf_Handle adcBufHandle
 Handle to the ADCBUF Driver: Valid only if the instance is executing the profile.
 
EDMA_Handle edmaHandle [EDMA_NUM_CC]
 Handle to the EDMA Driver. There can be multiple instances of the EDMA. This is valid only if the instance is executing the profile.
 
SOC_SysIntListenerHandle chirpAvailableListenerHandle
 Chirp Available System Interrupt Listener Handle: This is valid only if the instance is executing the profile and the profile is waiting for chirp interrupts.
 
SOC_SysIntListenerHandle frameStartListenerHandle
 Frame Start System Interrupt Listener Handle: This is valid only if the instance is executing the profile and the profile is waiting for frame start interrupts.
 
uint32_t profileStatus
 Status of the profile.
 
TestFmk_Cfg testfmkCfg
 Test Framework Configuration which is available to the Test Framework instance.
 
SemaphoreP_Handle semaphoreHandle
 Semaphore Handle: This is the main semaphore handle which is posted: More...
 
Mbox_Handle ipcMailboxHandle
 Remote IPC Mailbox Handle: This is used by the IPC module to communicate with the remote peer to exchange Test Framework IPC messages.
 
TestFmk_LocalIPCMsg localMsgQueue [TEST_FMK_MAX_LOCAL_QUEUE]
 Local IPC Message Queue: These are the messages which are exchanged by the IPC module for Local IPC.
 
TestFmk_LocalIPCMsg * localIPCMessagePendingQueue
 Local IPC Pending Message Queue: This is the queue of all the Local IPC Messages which have been posted but have still not been processed.
 
TestFmk_LocalIPCMsg * localIPCMessageFreeQueue
 Local IPC Free Message Queue: This is the queue of all the Local IPC Messages which are free and which can be posted.
 

Detailed Description

Test Framework Master control block.

The structure is used to hold all the relevant information required to execute the Test Framework module

Field Documentation

SemaphoreP_Handle TestFmk_MCB_t::semaphoreHandle

Semaphore Handle: This is the main semaphore handle which is posted:

  • Reception of chirp data
  • Reception of Test Framework IPC Messages
